1.0.name: wordpress/robin-e-commerce-customer-service
1.0.description:
Use ROBIN to deliver real time e-commerce customer service via live chat, email, web form and Twitter. With ROBIN integrated on your Wordpress site, a clearly visible contact tab will be shown on your site, enabling you to have real time conversations with your visitors. You can answer all customer support questions - from live chat, email, web form & Twitter - in one interface via your browser, iPhone, iPad or Android smartphone.

Core benefits of using ROBIN

  • Use one smart & easy to manage dashboard for all your conversations with visitors – via live chat, email, web form and Twitter
  • Work together with your team to build genuine relationships, manage satisfaction & create high quality word-of-mouth
  • Offer visitors a clear CTA to contact you, proactively ask for feedback & showcase your commitment to great customer service

Summarized features & benefits

  • First user always free!
